title: Web3: Más allá de la especulación
subtitle: Web3 History: Beyond the speculation
abstract: A comprehensive journey through internet history leading to Web3 innovation, starting with the 2008-2009 financial crisis that sparked the creation of Bitcoin through Satoshi Nakamoto's whitepaper. Explored blockchain's true value beyond the casino culture of memecoins and scams, focusing on real-world applications that solve coordination problems. Discussed practical programming languages and development paths for developers interested in building meaningful Web3 applications that create genuine societal value.
keyTakeaways: Blockchain's true value lies in solving coordination problems
Web3 UX must improve to achieve mainstream adoption
Latin America is uniquely positioned for Web3 innovation
